value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|This place, it's...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|It's chaos caused by the Tempest...
or so they say. Here, worlds beyond
number all tangle together.$k$p...Even put in those simple terms,
though, it isn't something that is
easily understood.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|F-Father? Is that you? You've been
brought here too?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Yes. I've been waiting for you here.$k$pNow, ready your weapon.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|My weapon? But...I don't see any
foes.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|I'm sorry, Ike, but the cause of all
this chaos...is me.$k$pYou cannot return to your world
without first defeating me.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|But...how can I take up arms against
my own father?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Worry not. I am not the Greil you
know. We have never met.$k$pI am a stranger from another world
that has become entangled with
yours. I am not your father.$k$pNow face me. And hold nothing back.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|But I—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Ike, listen to me. I've been training my
son since he was a young boy.$k$pNo matter how many times he fell,
he always got back up... The same is
true for you, is it not?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Father, I don't know if I can do this...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|When you are ready, come find me.
I'll be waiting.$k$p

$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Hmph! ...Well done.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|You weren't giving it everything you
have, were you, Father?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|A battle is a battle—I always give it
my all in the field.$k$pIt seems, though, that you've grown
quite strong, Ike...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Please, Father... You don't lose to
anyone. Even now, I'm no match for
you!$k$pEverything I know, I learned from you.
I just wanted to show you...how well
you taught me... To make you proud.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Is that so... Your devotion to your
father is admirable, Ike. I have no
doubt he is proud beyond measure.$k$p...I can feel the Tempest weakening.
This is the end, Ike.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Father, wait! You can't go yet...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グレイル,ch09_10_Greil_M_Valentine19,Face|Ike, remember this: you have what it
takes to become a great warrior...
Keep fighting. Keep getting stronger...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Valentine19,Face|Goodbye, Father...$k$p
